# Align Items

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support        |
|------------------------|----------------|
| `items-start`          | ✅ Full Support |
| `items-end`            | ✅ Full Support |
| `items-center`         | ✅ Full Support |
| `items-baseline`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `items-stretch`        | ✅ Full Support |
